sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button
    class="default-button"
    :class="{ 'reaction-field': theme === 'reaction-field' }"
  >
    {{ label }}
  </button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: ["label", "theme"],
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.default-button {
  border-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 0.3em;
  padding: 0.5em;
  background-color: hsl(180, 100%, 25%);
  color: #eee;
  box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px hsl(0, 0%, 66%);
}

.default-button:hover {
  background-color: hsl(180, 100%, 15%);
  box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px hsl(0, 0%, 56%);
}

.default-button:active {
  position: relative;
  top: 2px;
  box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 1px 0.5px hsl(180, 100%, 10%);
}

.default-button:disabled {
  box-shadow: none;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

.default-button.reaction-field {
  margin-top: 2rem;
  padding: 5rem;
}
</style>
